daily_fact: Today in NYC: Residents are enjoying a warm 'false fall' with highs in the 80s, bringing a cheerful vibe to the city!
topline_md: Recent updates in New York City include the thwarting of a telecommunications plot by the Secret Service, a high-rise building collapse with no injuries reported, and ongoing concerns over subway surfing fatalities among children, alongside significant political developments in the mayoral race and public safety incidents.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- Secret Service believes it thwarted plot that could have dismantled NYC's telecommunications network.
